overview: Sun-Wha lives in Karibong-Dong. Kuro-Gongdan, the mecca of industrialization and Karibong-Dong, the cultural spot of the factory workers in which Chosun tribe Town is located and foreign labors are hanging around now. Sun-wha is going to leave Garibong because of the company she works for is moving. During the packing, her precious wardrobe is broken. She feels distressed. Her pregnant friend, Hyang-Mi comes to see Sun-Hwa off and Sun-Hwa looks back at Karibong. She feels like that all her tearful stories during the 1970’s and the 1980’s in Karibong are disappearing.
title: GariVegas
